definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Its paid-in capital is NT$1 billion or more at the time when it applies for listing.
sentences.chinese: 二申请上市时之实收资本额达新台币十亿元以上者。

sentences.english: Here you are. Four beautiful fake Rolexes for Nt $5,000.
sentences.chinese: 来，4只漂亮的假劳力士才化了新台币5，000块。

sentences.english: Sponsorship requires a monthly commitment of just NT $500 or US$15.
sentences.chinese: 助养计画要求每月支付新台币500元或15美元。

sentences.english: A one-way ticket from Tainan to Kaohsiung costs 69 NT dollars.
sentences.chinese: 台南到高雄的单程票是新台币69元。

sentences.english: Those who violate the amended law would be fined a maximum NT$30,000.
sentences.chinese: 违反该法者将被处以最多三万新台币的罚款。

sentences.english: We have front row seats, which cost us NT5000 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在前排索价5000元新台币的座位。

sentences.english: Its paid in capital is NT$5 billion or more at the time when it applies for listing.
sentences.chinese: 二申请上市时之实收资本额达新台币五十亿元以上者。

sentences.english: It costs me NT$200 to buy the ticket.
sentences.chinese: 我花了新台币两佰元买这张票。

sentences.english: She estimates annual industry revenue at about T$5.8bn.
sentences.chinese: 她估计，该行业的全年收入总额大约为58亿新台币。

sentences.english: It's NT$2,000 a night including service charge.
sentences.chinese: 一个晚上新台币贰仟元含服务费。

sentences.english: He pays close attention to the floating exchange rate of the NTD.
sentences.chinese: 他在密切关注新台币兑美元的浮动汇率。

sentences.english: A small sweet-smelling orchid for just NT$10.
sentences.chinese: 一种味道很香的兰花，一朵新台币十元。

sentences.english: I would like to exchange New Tai Wan dollars to French Francs.
sentences.chinese: 我想把新台币换成法国法郎。

sentences.english: Its paid-in capital is NT$300 million or more at the time when it applies for listing.
sentences.chinese: 申请上市时之实收资本额达新台币三亿元以上者。

sentences.english: Caddie fee (House Caddie of the Club) is NT$1100 per a round.
sentences.chinese: 每回合杆弟费新台币1100元。

sentences.english: Violaters will be fined up to NT $30,000, or almost US $900.
sentences.chinese: 违反者罚款最高达三万元新台币或等同美金900元。

definition: peso (currency in Latin America) (loanword)/also written 比索[bi3 suo3]
Japanese yen (unit of currency)/also written 日圓|日圆
